### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 82
- Low Temperature (°F): 62
- Precipitation (in): 0.0
- Wind Speed (mph): 9
- Conditions: Fair

### Field Notes
- Streambed composition: gravel/cobble at WQ-01 through WQ-03, sand/silt at WQ-04 through WQ-06
- Field pH spot-check agrees with continuous data
- Cr at WQ-03: 140 µg/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (140 µg/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 µg/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (89.2 µg/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Cease-and-desist order in effect for unpermitted discharge

### Events
- WQ-04 telemetry antenna realigned after wind event
- Sediment trap at WQ-06 collected 42g dry weight
- Monthly QA/QC blanks submitted: all below detection

### Notes
- Day 28 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 140 µg/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.
